ygData.subject: Re: Megatron's agenda
ygData.msgSnippet: Megatron sneers, very well, I will return in a little while ,  Megatron exits the Destrons base, that fool, he thought to himself, scolding me Megatron. He

Subject: Re: Megatron's agenda

Megatron sneers, "very well, I will return in a little while",  Megatron 
exits the Destrons base, that fool, he thought to himself, scolding 
me Megatron. He will regret this, if I can find anyone on this 
mudball that will follow me. 

Bursts off at feet at his greatest speed towards where he saw the 
fire ball heading.
